articles.author: Rosy Cordero
articles.title: Picket Line Regulars Bolster Solidarity Among Writers As WGA Strike Hits 100 Days - Deadline
articles.description: Editor’s note: One in a series of stories marking the 100th day of the WGA strike. On day one of the Writers Guild of America (WGA) strike, scribes put their pencils down and hit the pave…
articles.content:
